title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Week Date and Local Time of Day with Time Shift and Reduced Precision (Basic Format)
description: A representation of week date combined with reduced precision local time of day (hour and minute only) and time shift from UTC in basic format [YYYY]["W"][ww][D]["T"][hh][mm][±][hh][mm] where seconds are omitted (§5.4.3 c)
